meanings.definition: relating to the complete set of genes or genetic material in an organism
meanings.sent1: The genomic makeup of the organism determines its traits.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the genomic information to understand inherited diseases.
meanings.sent3: The genomic puzzle was finally solved by the researchers.
meanings.sent4: Her genomic code held the key to unlocking the mystery of hereditary traits.
meanings.sent5: The genomic data revealed a fascinating pattern of genetic inheritance.

meanings.definition: the study or analysis of the complete set of genes in an organism
meanings.sent1: Genomic helps us understand how genes work together.
meanings.sent2: The field of genomic has made significant advancements in recent years.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for genomic was contagious among students.
meanings.sent4: In the world of biology, genomic is a crucial area of research.
meanings.sent5: The lab was buzzing with excitement over the latest genomic findings.
